entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY

LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS

LOWS AROUND 60
